apple_vendor_description: Apple's rendition of this couple emoji showcases a heartwarming embrace between a man with a medium skin tone and a woman with a dark skin tone, united by a glowing red heart suspended between them.  The signature Apple 3D shading and soft, rounded edges give the figures a gentle, loving presence, while the heart shines with a vibrant, glossy sheen.  This emoji, as seen on Apple devices, beautifully symbolizes a strong romantic connection, love, and partnership.
